titleStmt.title: WRONG United States Army Medical Department Regiment

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

org.orgName: WRONG United States Army Medical Department Regiment

body.p: Military Regiment of the United States Army. Originally formed on June 14, 1775 as part of the Continental Army.

ab.bibl: "About the AMEDD Regiment,"U.S. Army Medical Departmenthttps://ameddregiment.amedd.army.mil/about.html, viewed on June 17, 2020.
